Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Fantastic Four
Real Name: Ben Grimm
Special Powers
MARVEL'S FIRST FAMILY: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When a Thing heals from the Fantastic Four Team Ability, after resolutions remove an action token and modify Thing's combat values +1 until the end of your next turn.
HAD ENOUGH CLOBBERIN' YET?: Sidestep, Close Combat Expert. When an opposing character takes damage from Thing's close attacks, after resolutions choose one: Deal that character 1 unavoidable damage -or- make a close attack targeting that character. (Can activate on each hit.)
